titles.title: Improving SBA Engagement on Employee Ownership Act
Improving SBA Engagement on Employee Ownership Act
To direct the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to improve outreach and education on employee ownership, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary:
Improving SBA Engagement on Employee Ownership Act
This bill expands the Small Business Administration's outreach activities with respect to cooperatives or employee ownership of small businesses.
